title: Collaborative Study Groups
description: Join or create study groups tailored to your subjects or interests. Collaborate, discuss, and achieve your learning goals together.

title: Resource Sharing
description: Seamlessly share notes, links, documents, and videos within your groups to enhance collective learning and understanding.

title: Interactive Scheduling
description: Plan study sessions, set deadlines, and organize group activities with built-in scheduling tools for maximum productivity.

title: Live Chat and Discussions
description: Engage in real-time discussions with your group members, clarify doubts, and share ideas instantly through the integrated chat feature.
